html:
8.6.20  6:45 pm   How do you make synth sounds that have such realistic sounding wind articulation? Are you a wizard with the pitch bend wheel or do you have an EWI or something?

If it's the bend wheel then do you have any advice for getting better at using it? Whenever I try it always sounds so jarring.

      to master the pitch bend, it can be helpful to go through a period in life where the keyboard is your only friend

8.6.20  6:31 pm   Whatcha doing right now

      songwriting

8.6.20  6:13 pm   What's your favorite dance move 

      making a good impression in society

8.6.20  6:02 pm   How do you come up with your video ideas

      this might not be what you want to hear, but i have to just make them up

8.6.20  5:53 pm   roughly a year ago, things were green and gold and you weren't in hell (yet). have the colors changed? are you in hell yet?

      that was a song (still is)

8.6.20  5:50 pm   What do you think of the year 2020?

      i keep getting the year and century mixed up

8.6.20  5:48 pm   are your videos prophecies for the future

      we'll see

8.6.20  5:04 pm   What is the strangest question you have ever received?

      i have never received a strange question

8.6.20  4:57 pm   explain ducks

      the head is one of the most important parts but it's still not the only part

8.6.20  4:55 pm   when will you make more music?

      doing it now

8.6.20  4:38 pm   where did you learn music

      at home, and in the workplace

8.6.20  4:32 pm   What was your favorite video to work on?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.6.20  4:12 pm   how do you differentiate serious questions on this page to non-serious ones?

      they will have to differentiate themselves, if necessary

8.6.20  3:40 pm   What happens to our dreams when we wake up?

      they increase in value

8.6.20  3:22 pm   How do u write your songs 

      sometimes i use a little reverse psychology

8.6.20  3:13 pm   Do you think it's impossible to do everything?

     no

     I do but I'm going to try anyway

8.6.20  3:13 pm   what genre would you say your music is

      normal

8.6.20  3:10 pm   what was you inspired you to make the Mt st helans song

      i saw what looked like a huge duststorm outside the plane window. the whole world below was beige....i couldn't see anything. except a ridiculously huge mountain sticking through. i asked google what the huge mountain was, in that area, and it said it was probably mount st helens, and i said 'oh, i've heard of that'. that did not necessarily inspire a song yet. then i continued about my day, and then when i got to my hotel room, there was a painting of mount st helens there. kind of like how there's pictures of mt fuji all over japan, i suddenly got the idea that that mountain is a similar cultural icon in this place. so then it became obvious to do a song about it because it must be important

8.6.20  3:06 pm   How can I stop comparing my works with others?
Everytime I make a song there's no fun that comes with it because I criticize myself too haeshly.

      apply some of those criticism skills to the other artists you've been jealous of

8.6.20  2:30 pm   tho0ughts on crapitalism?

      it's pretty good

8.6.20  2:13 pm   How do you feel about clouds?

      they are surprisingly heavy

8.6.20  1:48 pm   I find songwriting very interesting because you are essentially creating a totally novel environment for yourself to come up with totally new ideas you would never have come up with unless you had come up with the previous ideas. It's like a constant stream of unique thoughts only made capable by the thoughts that have come prior.

     i agree

     Eg. I would never have come up with that solo if I hadn't come up with the previous 30 ideas to craft the environment for the solo. Have you ever thought about this?

     yes

8.6.20  1:43 pm   Who is sexy pants?

      thinking it might have actually been a desk

8.6.20  1:29 pm   What is your favourite type of doors? 

      the kind you can go through both ways

8.6.20  1:24 pm   What is happiness?

      only part of the picture

8.6.20  1:04 pm   Do you have any tips on how to play good piano tunes?

      pretty much just play 1 tune then another then another then another. they keep getting better, that's a fact

8.6.20  12:45 pm   do you believe in magic?

      yes

8.6.20  12:33 pm   How does one gain the ability to have a good voice AND be able to write music AND be able to play instruments well?

      you'd have to be pretty greedy

8.6.20  11:02 am   is the font choice on your site for the aesthetics or did you not know which one to use 

     i've left the choice up to you

8.6.20  10:47 am   What should I do?

      everything. there is time

8.6.20  10:28 am   How is Home Again so epic? Will you make another song as epic as Home Again?

      of course

8.6.20  10:25 am   what is your opinion on soup

      too good. beware

8.6.20  9:44 am   Why was 6 afraid of 7

      because 7 is bigger

8.6.20  8:48 am   have you ever tasted a croissant 

      embraced

8.6.20  8:18 am   Are you secretly god?

      i thought you were

8.6.20  8:01 am   What's your best tip to get better at music?

      that happens automatically as long as you are having a good time

8.6.20  7:39 am   I feel like i waisted my time trying to be an artist. Have you ever felt this way?

      no but sometimes i may feel like i've wasted time if it seems like i was trying to do it in ineffective ways

8.6.20  6:39 am   Are you such a musican human???

      that sounds familiar

8.6.20  5:42 am   Ur music is so good what is the genre??? 

      regular

8.6.20  4:51 am   Do you feel pressured by people to make more music?

     no, the pressure is from me

      And if you do, does the pressure make you want the pressure to go away?

     no

8.6.20  3:22 am   how can I write a love song but without a single love word in it?

      that's automatic. every song is a love song

8.6.20  2:20 am   what makes music music.

     it's a collaboration between you and the music

      how do you find ur music

     sometimes use a small piece of cheese as bait

8.6.20  2:05 am   Are you really working on a big project?

      that all depends whether 'getting ready to make videos for the rest of my life' counts as a project, which i think it does, it certainly did last time

8.6.20  1:41 am   preferred length of shorts?

      long

8.6.20  1:28 am   I feel like changing the entire world as much as possible before my time comes. But I still don't know where to start from ?

      do you have any ideas for how you wish the world was better or different

8.6.20  1:22 am   are you a timelord?

      timesmith

8.6.20  1:17 am   do you ever put cryptic puzzles or hints into videos?

      sure

8.6.20  12:59 am   I've noticed you only appear physically in some of your videos (La de dah, might quit etc.) while others are just animation (like outside or christmas isn't real) how do you decide which songs follow which method?  

      if i do too many of one way, do some the other way. perhaps i could settle for just one way, if life were much simpler

8.6.20  12:58 am   what bad thing did you do?

      did a bad and good thing at the same time, and they cancelled each other out

8.6.20  12:47 am   Are you really from earth?

      oh that would explain a lot
